name: Game Maker Background Image File
summary: Learn about .GMBCK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GMBCK files are used by GameMaker for auto-generating in-game textures; they may be created and saved using the Background Properties window in GameMaker.

description: Graphic file used by games created with GameMaker, a game development IDE published by YoYo Games; contains a collection of images that can be tiled in the background of a game scene; also stores the background's name and target image size.
